description: Nabors Corporate Services, Inc. is headquartered in Houston, Texas, which manufactures a wide range of world-class drilling equipment, rig control systems, oil well instrumentation and is one of the fastest growing suppliers of suites of software products to manage drilling data, analysis & reporting systems. Nabors is one of the world's largest providers of land and offshore platform drilling services for exploration and development of oil, gas and geothermal wells. Involved in design and development of Enterprise Applications.

This Client is major American multinational information Technology Corporation headquartered in Palo Alto, California, United States.  The main focus of their business is PC Note books, Printers & Cloud Services. This is purely Agile based project. We are transforming the existing application developed in classic asp, asp.net to Angular 2.0, MVC 6.0 with asynchronous service oriented architecture.

projects.project: AIG – VALIC Digital Online Website redesign (www.valic.com) – AIG VALIC, Houston, TX
description: VALIC, a subsidiary of American International Group, Inc., (AIG), is an insurance corporation that specializes in tax-qualified retirement plans, supplemental tax-deferred and after-tax investments.VALIC offers a variety of products, including Valic Online (VOL). VOL is a technology upgrade project to transform the Customer Experience on the existing applications to provide a responsive UI and to maximize the user engagement.  VOL is a Modular / framework-based architecture for better performance and flexibility with better user experience. It follows Agile Scrum & Iterative development approach for speed to market. It is a re-engineering of VOL Transactions encompassing new personalization. It has re-usable services developed on top of Web APIs to serve multi channels format requirement with robust architecture to ensure future-proof, reusable design. Integration with other application (like mainframe, Agile Net and Financial Soundings).

AXALTA is a data migration project from IBM Lotus Notes to SharePoint. The scope of project includes the migration of the Lotus Notes Domino applications to SharePoint. High level analysis for 200 Lotus Notes Domino applications is performed, detailed analysis of 70 of them and migration of 15 applications done. Quest Tool has been used for the high level analysis and data migration from Lotus Notes to SharePoint. High Level analysis of the 117 Lotus QuickR applications has been carried out using the Quest tool. SharePoint applications were categorized based on the complexity and related applications are grouped together as a SharePoint template and additional features are included as part of each application.

SSE is a data migration project from IBM Lotus Notes to SharePoint /Asp. Net. The scope of project includes the migration of the Lotus Notes Domino applications to SharePoint Portal and the QuickR sites to SharePoint. High level analysis for 400 Lotus Notes Domino applications is performed, detailed analysis of 200 of them and migration of 20 applications done. Quest Tool has been used for the high level analysis and data migration from Lotus Notes to SharePoint. High Level analysis of the 117 Lotus QuickR applications has been carried out using the Quest tool. One very high complex Lotus Notes application has been migrated to ASP .NET solution. SharePoint applications were categorized based on the complexity and related applications are grouped together as a SharePoint template and additional features are included as part of each application.

This involves providing SharePoint support to all the Tata Communications users (nearly 2000 users) who use SharePoint on a regular basis by using the OOTB functionalities which SharePoint readily provides.

Water Supply monitoring application is to help manage water supply distribution – Litres Per Capita per Day (LPCD) from various water supply sources.  Provide reporting for ULB administrators to region wise LPCD requirements and service attributes. The ULB Water Supply Monitoring System comprises of building a data entry screen in web portal and then displaying the dashboard of the water supply status in a mobile app for ULB’s.

Collab is a collaboration platform based on Microsoft’s SharePoint that integrates the best features of social networking, collaboration software, community software, automated workflow and social media monitoring to extend a layer of social capabilities across every level of your business.

AUDOCS Proposal Automation enables you to analyse complex RFPs and quickly searches your entire database of pre-approved answers to produce high-probability matches for the questions and requirements. You'll be able to quickly generate a professional RFP response — including cover letter, title page, table of contents, compliance matrix, and the questions and answers — in the Microsoft Word template specific to your business.
